aboutpara: A Master level IT graduate with top academic results and a full right to work in Australia. Throughout my studies at RMIT, I have completed multiple projects demonstrating my skills and abilities in designing, developing, and testing software applications using various technologies and tools, such as ReactJS, Django, Google Cloud, Flutter, Firebase, Java, Python, C++, GitHub, and Agile. With a strong passion and excitement for technology, I strongly believe that I will make a huge contribution to projects in the industry.
